name: Wild Wolf Animals Simulator 3d
description: Wild Wolf Animals Simulator 3d takes you on a wild & risky adventure of the wolves. Enjoy and explore the wild kingdom of wolves, foxes and lynxes. Wild Wolf Animals Simulator 3d is an epic RPG game with lots of unique characters and different stories of wild wolves. The dark and evil wolves have wreak havoc in the middle of the jungle. It is your duty to defeat these evil wolves and bring balance and harmony to the wolves fantasy jungle. Gather a group of wild wolves and craft a clan of your own. Fight with other wolves and Survive their deadly attacks. Earn coins as you complete all the levels. By completing levels and earning coins, you can unlock different unique wolves in this game. Each wolf is unique and different from other wolves in their shape and abilities. Explore the vast jungle and enjoy the scenery of natural landscapes. You can freely roam in this big environment. Take the chance to experience the awesome 3d graphics of this game. All wolves are designed professionally for a better user experience. The UI is very friendly in terms of user experience. It makes it easy for users to interact with the interface of this game.
